app.title: CV Generator
app.about.get-notified.description: a Twitter bot that helps you to stay up to date with releases of popular frontend frameworks & libraries!
app.features.title: Features
app.features.angular-cli: A command line interface for Angular
app.features.ngrx: One way data flow powered by RxJS Observables
app.features.rxjs: Reactive programming with async collections using Observables
app.features.bootstrap: Responsive layout from battle tested, world most famous UI library
app.features.typescript: Superior developer experience, code completion, refactoring and less bugs
app.features.fontawesome: Easy to use vector icons and social logos
app.features.themes: Flexible theming support for provided and custom components
app.features.themes.title: Themes
app.features.lazyloading: Faster startup time with lazy loaded feature modules
app.features.lazyloading.title: Lazy loading
